full_summary:
# W689C-220015_C: General Trades Services

**Tender Information**

* **Reference Number**: WS4071762417-Document 4290930400
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4071762417
* **Publication Date**: November 3, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 5, 2023, 12:00:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date**: November 6, 2023
* **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)

**Procurement Details**

* **Procurement Category**: CNST
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity**: Alberta
* **Region of Delivery**: Alberta

**Request for Standing Offer**

This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) is available on SAP Ariba, and there are no fees to access the information or bid on SAP Ariba. The tender notice can be viewed at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17912023.

The RFSO cancels and supersedes previous RFSO number WS4071762417 (Doc4164105259), dated August 25, 2023, with a closing date of September 25, 2023. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who participated in the previous solicitation.

**Work Description**

The contract covers the supply of all labour, material, tools, equipment, travel, and expertise required to provide minor repairs and maintenance in general trades at the following Department of National Defence work sites:

* Vimy Ridge Armoury - 337 Stubb Ross Road, Lethbridge
* Patterson Armoury - 120 Cuyler Road, Medicine Hat
* Kipp Range - 10 km NW of Lethbridge on Hwy 509

Services will be provided on an "as requested" basis. It is anticipated that one (1) firm will be issued the standing offer. The standing offer will be issued for a period of three (3) years with two (2) additional 1-year option years.

**Contact Information**

* **Contact Name**: Victoria Lee, PSPC
* **Contact Email**: victoria.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Information**: Not Available

**
